document.full_text: libya turned to a management committee member of the state-owned oil company on thursday to represent its views at a meeting of gas exporting states following the defection of its top oil official.
document.title: libya sends replacement executive to gas forum
lines_and_colors: libya turned to a management committee member of the state-owned oil company on thursday to represent its views at a meeting of gas exporting states following the defection of its top oil official.
